Actionscript.script: //瞬间移动[参数：X,Y,是否自动转向] parent.$fighter_ctrler.moveToTarget(0,0,false);
//瞬间移动[参数：X,Y,是否自动转向] parent.$fighter_ctrler.moveToTarget(60,null,true);
//检测上次攻击，通过ID判断，如果通过，则跳转到相应的帧[参数：攻击ID，帧标签，检查失败时是否返回站立，对方防御时是否继续攻击] parent.$mc_ctrler.justHitToPlay("sbs1","上必杀_HIT",false,false);
//瞬间移动[参数：X,Y,是否自动转向] parent.$fighter_ctrler.moveToTarget(30,0,true);
//瞬间移动[参数：X,Y,是否自动转向] parent.$fighter_ctrler.moveToTarget(30,0,true);
//瞬间移动[参数：X,Y,是否自动转向] parent.$fighter_ctrler.moveToTarget(30,0,true);
//瞬间移动[参数：X,Y,是否自动转向] parent.$fighter_ctrler.moveToTarget(30,0,true);
//瞬间移动[参数：X,Y,是否自动转向] parent.$fighter_ctrler.moveToTarget(50,0,true);
//瞬间移动[参数：X,Y,是否自动转向] parent.$fighter_ctrler.moveToTarget(50,0,true);
//瞬间移动[参数：X,Y,是否自动转向] parent.$fighter_ctrler.moveToTarget(50,-70,true);
